query:
SELECT 
  p.id, p.orderNumber, p.orderDate, p.customerRef, p.rawAreaText,
  h.customerName as hospitalName,
  a.name as areaName
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id
LEFT JOIN areas a ON p.areaId = a.id
WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000546'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3xdfM6hBeGk8i8i.5dbeac8a2102 --database DxAqoJ22pGdNTCdjRs8uzu --execute SELECT 
  p.id, p.orderNumber, p.orderDate, p.customerRef, p.rawAreaText,
  h.customerName as hospitalName,
  a.name as areaName
FROM purchases p
LEFT JOIN hospitals h ON p.hospitalId = h.id
LEFT JOIN areas a ON p.areaId = a.id
WHERE p.orderNumber = 'SO-U-00000546'
